Name: Small Wooly, Big Adventures
QuestDesc:
While in Jinzhou, you run into Encore on vacation. She extends a special invitation to youâ€”
The adventure is about to begin! As Encore's closest friend, will you join the Wooly Warrior on this exciting journey?

Dialogues.Speaker: Doudou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What happens next, Encore?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mingming
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, we wanna hear the rest of the story!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, settle down you two. The Wooly Warrior will come out once everyone's nicely in their seats.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Plus, Encore's still waiting for a friend. Ah, there {Male=he;Female=she} is!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore finally got to see you again!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore was wondering if you'd come, and even had Cosmos and Cloudy go scouting for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore wants you to come play with us and listen to our stories!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Everyone was so busy the last time Encore's here in Jinzhou, we didn't even get to play together.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But Encore won't let that happen again, cuz Encore's here on vacation this time!

Options.PlotLineKey: Didn't know they gave vacations at Black Shores.
Vacation? Is your homework done yet?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course, they do. Everyone at Black Shores is really nice. Even someone as busy as Aalto gets to have them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What? Encore doesn't know anything about any homework.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, since we finally got some free time, I told Aalto I wanted to visit some friends in Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But he just lay in his chair, bragged about how he has so much grown-up stuff to worry about and was too busy for playtime.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, poor grown-ups, they're always so busy. They don't even have time for stories.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, too bad for Aalto. All I could do was come here by myself with my stories and Aalto's wallet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Right, let me introduce you to everyone, but I think most of them have heard about you already.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Gather round everyone. Encore presents to you {PlayerName}! Savior of Jinzhou. Hero of heroes!

Options.PlotLineKey: I'm not too sure about that last part, Encore.

Dialogues.Speaker: Doudou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, really?! So you're the big hero Encore was talking about. She said you took out that giant TD like this, this, and that! So cool!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, stop trying to hide it already!

Dialogues.Speaker: Doudou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah! Encore told us how you took out that giant TD like this, this, and that! So cool!

Dialogues.Speaker: Doudou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you here for some stories, big hero?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mingming
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yup! Encore's stories are really fun, last time we had one about a big bad wolf that can turn itself into mist.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Sounds a lot like Aalto...)

Dialogues.Speaker: Doudou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, oh. There's this other story about a golden-eyed kitty and its little birdie friend with gray feathers.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (This one's about me and Yangyang...)

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uh-huh! There's plenty more of them! This time Encore's got a whole new story to tell!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's about the adventures of the Wooly Warrior. You'll love it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's right! Adventures are the best!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait till you hear the actual story. I don't wanna spoil anything just yet!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, wanna hear Encore's stories?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you enjoy stories, Rover, you might even get to go inside one. Whaddya say, Woolies?

Dialogues.Speaker: Cosmos & Cloudy
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Baa!

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Go inside a story... Is Encore using some kind of metaphor? Doesn't hurt to check it out I guess.)

Options.PlotLineKey: I've got other things to do.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Great! Come, Encore's even saved a front-row seat just for you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All right. Settle down everyone. The story's about to start!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, that's too bad. I guess you have more important things to take care of...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But, if you ever wanna hear some stories, come find Encore. Encore's saved a front-row seat just for you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
You come across Encore who is on vacation in Jinzhou. She is overjoyed to see you.

With enthusiasm, she introduces you to her friends and reserves a seat, inviting you to listen to her latest story.

Chapters.Title: Sit down and wait for the story to begin

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All right. Settle down everyone. The story's about to start!

Dialogues.Speaker: Serious Child
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is it about the gray birdie? We didn't get to finish it last time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nope, today's story will be about the Wooly Warrior and how she makes her wishes come true.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The story begins in a land of boundless imagination known as the Wooly Kingdom...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Legend says, that deep within the kingdom's castle lies a magical gateway. Whoever passes through it can have any wish come true!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To reach this gateway, you must first go over a great many obstacles.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yet, countless adventurers still choose to embark on this journey, for each holds wishes to fulfill.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Before setting off on their quests, Fairy Cloudy will ask them:

Dialogues.Speaker: Cloudy (Encore)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Should you pass through this mythical gateway, you will be granted endless wealth and honor, along with a treasure trove of unforgettable memories."

Dialogues.Speaker: Cloudy (Encore)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Now answer me this... What drives you to venture on this risky journey?"

Dialogues.Speaker: Serious Child
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you'd ask me... I'd choose wealth, that way I can buy all the Star Flakes I can eat!

Dialogues.Speaker: Skeptical Child
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Pfft. I'd definitely choose honor, that way I'll be famous, and everyone would shout my name whenever they see me, wherever!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cloudy (Encore)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "What about you, brave adventurer? Do you seek riches or fame? Baa."

Dialogues.Speaker: Cloudy (Encore)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thus you shall accompany the merchants and travel across the high seas to Rinascita.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cloudy (Encore)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They say treasures fill its lands, and you'll gain a fortune beyond your wildest dreams!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cloudy (Encore)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It appears you're already quite renowned! Baa. Just traverse countless lands along the boundless horizon, and all shall know your name!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ooh, so this is the kind of choice a grown-up would make!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's something the Wooly Warrior would say! Maybe the two of you can team up and adventure together!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: See? Everyone's wishes are different, which also make their journeys unique!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And among these people, there's a small adventurer that goes by the name of "Wooly Warrior." When asked about her desires, she replies:

Dialogues.Speaker: Cosmos (Encore)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "I do not seek wealth or honor. Baa."

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fairy Cloudy, greatly puzzled by this reply, goes on to ask:

Dialogues.Speaker: Cloudy (Encore)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "If you desire neither wealth nor honor, why do you choose to venture to the Gateway of Wishes?"

Dialogues.Speaker: Cosmos (Encore)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "I have but one wish, to be reunited with my family."

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fairy Cloudy nods in approval and offers her guidance to the little warrior.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cloudy (Encore)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Very well... then believe in my tale, and close your eyes, Little Warrior and her companions.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cloudy (Encore)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When you open your eyes, a brand-new adventure shall unfold before you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cloudy (Encore)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Once we've completed this story together, your wishes will all be granted!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, does the Wooly Warrior's companion accept this invitation?

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
You settle in, listening intently as Encore begins the story of the Wooly Warrior.

In her tale, the Wooly Warrior embarks on a perilous journey to reunite with its family, seeking the Gateway of Wishes.

"If you believe in this story and wish to make your own dreams come true, close your eyes," whispers Fairy Cloudy.

Taking her words to heart, you close your eyes, ready to plunge into a new adventure.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Where am I...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, hey! Over here!

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Is that Encore? I should go check it out.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You must be new to this place! Are you also searching for the Gateway of Wishes?

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Gateway of Wishes? Looks like I'm inside Encore's story somehow...)

Options.PlotLineKey: I just want to find my way back.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's great! How about we team up? I have a wish I want to make, too!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then we'll be going in the same direction! If we reach the end of this journey and find out about the Gateway of Wishes, we'll be back to the real world in no time!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since it's your first time here, everything must feel strange to you, huh?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is the Wooly Kingdom, a land filled with lots and lots of woolies. Look, even the clouds are shaped like them!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're in luck, I know this place like the back of my hand. I can be your tour guide!

Options.PlotLineKey: I want to look around on my own.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yippee! Let's go!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh. Okay then... I mean, we're heading in the same direction anyway. You can look at your part and I'll look at mine.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fairy Cloudy told me that as long as we walk along this path, we'll get there eventually!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Once we're there, I gotta make her tell us where all the treasure is hidden...

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
As you open your eyes, you find yourself within the world of the story. Soon, you cross paths with Encore, who is searching for the legendary Gateway of Wishes. She explains that you're in the Wooly Kingdom and that a way out lies at the end of the road.
You decide to journey together.

Chapters.Title: Go on an adventure with Encore

Dialogues.Speaker: Cloudy
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please don't hurt me. Baa... I'm just an ordinary box. Baa...

Chapters.Title: Go on an adventure with Encore

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Beware." This is where many Wooly stories begin.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When the story gets longer, so will the paths ahead. We might even come across broken bridges and stuff.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since we'll only be telling the beginning of the story this time, we should get to the end pretty soon.

Chapters.Title: Go on an adventure with Encore
Go on an adventure with Encore

Dialogues.Speaker: "Cosmos"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tee-hee. You're in for some surprises! Baa.

Chapters.Title: Go on an adventure with Encore
Defeat the monsters in your way

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Look at all these monsters. Let's beat 'em up!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cloudy
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ohhh... You're finally here. Those terrible monsters. Baa...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is Cloudy Fairy. She gets scared pretty easily, but she's really nice and will give us directions.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (She's even got all the settings prepared and everything...)

Dialogues.Speaker: Cloudy
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So you're searching for the Gateway of Wishes? Baa. All you need to do is follow this path and collect three relics. Baa...

Dialogues.Speaker: Cloudy
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes! The first relic is the Sword of Courage. To obtain it, you'll have to face all of your challenges head-on. Be careful...

Dialogues.Speaker: Cloudy
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Next, the Shield of Faith. This is a tricky one, but so long as you believe in yourself, you'll find it eventually after searching every nook and cranny.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cloudy
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And finally, the Wreath of Hope. A crown of flowers that can reflect a person's thoughts. Never withers, forever blossoming.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cloudy
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Once you've gathered all three relics, the Gateway of Wishes will open before you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perfect. Now that we have clues about the relics, Wooly Warrior's adventures are officially a go.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All we need to do now is go through this door and we'll be back to the real world!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, Fairy Cloudy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cloudy
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're very welcome, dear! If you have any more questions, do come back anytime. Baa-Baa now!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
At the end of your journey, you encounter Fairy Cloudy, who reveals that to reach the Gateway of Wishes, you must first gather three relics: the Sword of Courage, the Shield of Faith, and the Wreath of Hope.
Now, let's pass through the gate and return to reality.

Chapters.Title: Enter the gateway to return to reality

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, welcome back from the Wooly Kingdom!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yuppers! It's where all the Wooly stories begin. Cosmos and Cloudy's home!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With their help, Encore can even invite friends for a visit!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But not everyone though. The Wooly Kingdom won't welcome anyone who thinks the stories are just made up.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're different. You're one of Encore's best friends and have listened to my stories. So Encore wanted to give you a surprise!

Options.PlotLineKey: The fights were a bit too realistic for me...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I know, right? You and I work great as a team!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Really? But you have to admit, the part where Wooly Warrior kicked monster butts was suuuper cool, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore really enjoys this story. In it, Wooly Warrior and her companions worked their way out of all kinds of trouble. Just like we did.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mom said that as long as you believe, the stories will give you strength. So whenever I think of them, it makes my heart feel warm.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And Encore wants to share this warm feeling with you and make you happy too!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Because Encore loves to play and adventure with you! It's just that everyone was so busy last time...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But, this time Encore's here on vacation! Curious about what happens next in the story, Rover?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you are, you should join Encore's adventure team, that way we can go and find out its ending together!

Options.PlotLineKey: Can I be the team captain?
Is this turning into a make-believe game...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Umm... Sure, you can be captain and Encore will be the vice-captain!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ohh, it's not make-believe, this is a serious adventure game! I've been playing it ever since I was little, it'll be a blast! This time, you can be the team captain and I can be the vice-captain!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, for our first team assignment, let's go find out everyone's thoughts on the story!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The joys of the story should be shared with everyone. It's not just my story.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Once we know what the audience thinks, we'll know how to work on the story going forward!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After all, it's the applause that makes for a curtain call!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay! Let's see...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Look! That girl by herself over there, Encore wonders what she thinks about the story... Come on. Let's go ask her!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
As you open your eyes, the world around you snaps back to reality.

Encore explains that only those who truly believe in her tale are welcomed into her Wooly Kingdom.

She invites you to join her Wooly Adventure Squad to see the story's end with her.

The first step in this journey is to gather the thoughts of the audience about the tale.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey! I saw you all by yourself over here. What's your name?

Dialogues.Speaker: Shy Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I-I'm Ying.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ying! Got it! This is {PlayerName}, {Male=he;Female=she}'s the captain of Team Wooly!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Y-Yes. Hello. You're here to ask about my thoughts on the story, right? I actually have something to ask you...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ask away. Encore will answer anything.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: O-okay... Is it true, that after gathering all three relics you can have your wishes come true?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, it's what it says in the story.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I-I'd like you to see this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lemme see! It's a map on a piece of wood...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That looks like a lighthouse and a giant rock over here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But Encore can't really tell exactly where it is.

Options.PlotLineKey: It seems to be in the Central Plains.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whoa, you could tell just from that? You must've been to every corner of Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There, an area on the map is circled out with a sword-shaped sign on it... Wait!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Could this be a treasure map?! That sign must be the Sword of Courage!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore remembers that at some point of the story, the Wooly Warrior will get her hands on a treasure map...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This map. Where did you find it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's from my mom... This map is a promise we made.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mom took me to a play one time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I remember in that play, the adventurers wanted to have their wishes come true, so with the Wooly Fairy's help, they set off to find the legendary relics. Just like in the story you told us!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After watching it, I asked Mom all the time if these relics that could make wishes come true were real, and whether we could go look for them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But she was always busy with work as a Ranger, so she wasn't home much.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then one day, Mom gave me this treasure map. She said she got it from the Wooly Fairy and it's for one of the hidden relics.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She told me next time she came back from work, she would go relic hunting with me and that I wouldn't have to be afraid of anything with her around.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She wanted me to think hard about what I'd wish for most once we found all the relics.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I-I thought of a lot of wishes. I wanted to have all the Star Flakes I could eat, lots and lots of new toys...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: B-but now, I only have one wish...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I wanna see my mom again. There are so many things I wanna tell her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The grown-ups all said that Mom was on a mission somewhere far, far away. But I felt like they were hiding something from me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I knew Mom's never coming home. But... I just wanted to see her again, and then I thought of her treasure map.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I told Dad about the map, and he just hugged me and didn't say anything.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But when I heard your story, I was thinking... if it's all true. Then maybe, just maybe...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then you should join our team!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore knows that grown-ups always say that kind of thing just to be nice. Most of them are okay, just a little stuffy sometimes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore's heard a lot of them before, so Encore can tell what's real and what's not.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Like this treasure map. It's 100% real, that's for sure!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Y-you really think so?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yup! Trust me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since your mom left you this treasure map, then there's more reason we should go look for it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Plus, {PlayerName} and I are searching for an ending to the story...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now the clue to the ending is right in our hands. Whaddya say, Captain? Let's get this journey started!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Team Wooly is ready to roll out. Objective: The three relics!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm. I'm not really familiar with Jinzhou... Have you ever been to that place, Ying?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, Mom would sometimes take me on a field trip there. But she warned me not to go there alone because TDs might show up.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's why she said she wanted to go with you. Together.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All right then, it's settled. Let's go, got no time to waste!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
While collecting opinions, you meet a girl named Ying, who shares with you a treasure map leading to the Sword of Courage. This map holds a promise between Ying and her mother, with her deepest wish being to reunite with her once more.

Determined to fulfill Ying's wish and bring the Wooly Warrior's adventure to its good conclusion, you set off to uncover three legendary relics.

Chapters.Title: Head to the location marked in the treasure map

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: According to the treasure map, the sword should be around here somewhere.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why are there so many Tick Tacks? Are they having a party?

Dialogues.Speaker: Tick Tack
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tick-tack... Tick-tick-tack-tack!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They look really angry...

Options.PlotLineKey: They're not much of a threat.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No need to be afraid, Ying! We'll keep you safe!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You probably don't know this, but Wooly Warrior once met a huge cat monster a hundred times stronger than her, and she was so scared that her legs were trembling!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: R-really?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's right, but even so, she stood her ground.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Because she had all of her friends behind her, she had to fight.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just like the situation we're in now. Ya can't let a few small TDs beat you down.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's make this quick, Encore.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
Upon arriving at your destination, you're suddenly ambushed by a horde of monsters!

To safeguard your friends, the courageous Wooly Warrior rises to the challenge!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You two were incredible...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You betcha!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait till you see what else we can do! Am I right, {PlayerName}?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We'll take on anything they chuck at us!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you sure? Doesn't look like you are. Lemme give you a quick check-up...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh! Cut it out already!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Quick, let's check and see if the sword's around here. Is that some kind of puzzle over there? Do we need to put something inside of it to activate it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's a bit too high for Ying and me to reach.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I got it. Looks like we just need to place the treasure map on top.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
After defeating the monsters, you discover a mechanism at the site.

It can only be unlocked using the treasure map.

Chapters.Title: Interact with the treasure map to activate the mechanism

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whoa... There's another puzzle!

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Was it not in the story before?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, random twists and moments do happen here and there. It's an adventure after all.

Chapters.Title: Head to the top of the platform and open the Gift Box

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: W-we're so high up... This is even higher than any of the climbing games Mom and I used to play...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just keep looking ahead and it won't be as scary. It's easy. Here, watch!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So... Is this the sword in the story that can slice through anything?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's the mountain-chopping Sword of Courage!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... The sword's actually made out of wood, and it's missing a small piece too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, it looks like it's made out of wood. I don't think it's gonna cut anything really...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Look, there's a letter.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Quick. What does it say?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "My dear little warrior, you've found the first relic!"

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Right now you must be thinking, 'What a plain-looking sword.'"

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "How could this ordinary wooden sword possibly be the legendary Sword of Courage?"

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Don't feel disappointed just yet, think back on what you've been through so far."

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "All the challenges you've faced along the way. The waves under your feet felt so high to you, and the treasure chest above seemed ever so far away."

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Yet still you continued to climb the mountains, every step of the way, until you finally reached the peak. Your courage has been heard."

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "And this seemingly ordinary wooden sword..."

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is the proof of your courage.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, that's what it says in the letter. How did you know, Encore?

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Did it also appear in other Wooly stories?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uh uh...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anything else? Did the letter mention any clues about the next relic? We still have two to go!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah. Y-yes!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It goes on to say, "Oh, little warrior, your adventure doesn't end here."

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "To have your wishes come true, courage alone is not enough."

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "You need not look far, as the shield that symbolizes faith is buried right beneath your very feet."

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "In a land covered in sand, treasures may lay, or there may be nothing at all."

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A land covered in sand...

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I know just the place.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then let's go check it out! Sounds like it'll be a treasure hunt in the sand!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
With great effort, you finally reach the top platform of the mechanism and unlock the chestâ€”inside lies the Sword of Courage and a mysterious letter.

The letter reveals that the next relic, the Shield of Faith, is buried deep in the sands ahead.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We're here! At long last, the brave adventurers reach their second destination, and thus they start a hunt for the legendary Shield of Faith on this sand-covered beach.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They say only the bravest adventurers can find it as it puts their will to the test.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah! That's the spirit!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, you don't wanna jinx it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ying can go left, Encore will go right, and you can take care of the middle!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If anyone finds anything interesting, show me and we can take a look at it together!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: O-Okay.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Upon reaching the sands where the Shield of Faith is hidden, you and your team split up to search for the relic.

Chapters.Title: Search for the Shield of Faith on the beach

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As you search the beach and find nothing, you can't help but wonder: Does the Shield of Faith from the story really exist?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You dig up an old boot. Hey! No littering!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Surprise! An abandoned treasure chest! Who knowsâ€”maybe there's something shiny inside?

Chapters.Title: Search for the Shield of Faith on the beach

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Bingo. This has to be the Shield of Faith.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm? There's a letter attached to it. I should bring it over to Encore and Ying.

Chapters.Title: Hand over the relics to Encore

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well? Did you find the shield?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Way to go! I know who to call if I ever need to find something. I'll go get Ying!

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This should be the shield mentioned in the story.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's also made of wood...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But look at how well-made it is! With the Sword of Courage in one hand, and the Shield of Faith in the other, it's an invincible combo!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The person who crafted this shield really knew their stuff!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Time for clues about the next relic. The Wreath of Hope.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hurry, Ying! What does it say?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: O-Okay. Let's see here. It says...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Congratulations again to you, my little warrior."

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Although the bulk of your efforts were in vain, you did not give up and continued searching. Hence, this Shield of Faith is your well-deserved reward."

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "If you ever feel lost in the future, why not take a moment and ponder on the meaning of your journey?"

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "The firm belief in our hearts shall guide us through darkness until we reach the light of hope."

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Now, I'm sure you're wondering how can you find the Wreath of Hope."

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Bring with you your wishes and proceed to the Garden of Promise."

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The garden?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Garden of Promiseâ€”

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh! I think... I might know where it is.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fantastic! Then that's our next stop! Onwards!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
After discovering the Shield of Faith along with a second letter, you learn that the Wreath of Hope is hidden within the Garden.

Ying then reveals that she knows the location of the Garden, and you agree to journey there together.

Chapters.Title: Follow Ying to find the Wreath

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This place... feels empty. There's nothing here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It is now...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: B-But it used to be filled with irises.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is my mom's garden. She used to love flowers and would plant a lot of them when she wasn't busy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Before she left, she asked me to help look after it, and said she'd come see it with me when she's back.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I watered them every day, hoping they could bloom longer.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But these flowers only bloom for a short time. They all withered in the end...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Dad told me, "Don't be sad, sweetie. It's the natural cycle of life."

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I understood that. But it always reminds me of my promise to Mom.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I miss her so much...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now I see, this shield and sword are all treasures that Mom left me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And here, I think she probably wanted to make a wreath with me using those flowers...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, Ying...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, Encore and {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Actually, when I saw Dad looking sad while holding the map, I had the feeling that Mom...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Might have left this treasure map to play a game with me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe it is like what the grown-ups say, the Gateway of Wishes doesn't exist.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And I may never get to see her again, talk to her, and tell her how much I've grown...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But Mom must've wanted to give me a surprise, to make me happy...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I am happy because we managed to find all the treasures she left behind together.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll definitely find a nice place to keep this sword and shield safe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I think we should end our adventure here. Thank you, Encore and {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our captain hasn't announced the end of our adventure yet, and you're thinking about leaving already?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, okay then. Let's call it a day right here. There's some stuff I need to wrap my head around too...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I remember you asked me about the ending of the Wooly Warrior, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Even though we finished finding the relics, Team Wooly's adventure goes on.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There are still plenty of stories to tell... Oh, I know!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How about you come to Encore's story session tomorrow afternoon?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tomorrow... You mean right here?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes! If you want to find out what happens to Team Wooly, come over and listen to the rest of the story. Be there or be square!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I... Okay then. I'll see you tomorrow!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yup. See you tomorrow, Ying.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, do you think this is a good ending to the story?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mm-hmm. After all, Ying got the treasures left by her mother.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If this was a story, it would end something like this: "In the end, the little warrior managed to collect all of the relics left by her mother, realizing her intentions."

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah! After all, Ying didn't receive the wreath and she didn't get to see her mother.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Even though in the end, the little warrior did manage to collect all of the relics left by her, realizing her mother's intentions.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But Encore still feels like something's missing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In this ending, she didn't even make it to the Gateway of Wishes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just like in the story of the Wooly Warrior.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What do you think? Will the Wooly Warrior's wish come true in the end?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If it comes true, then she should be able to see her family again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After such a wonderful and interesting adventure, she must have so much to say to them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Even if her wish doesn't come true, the Wooly Warrior will still continue on her adventures.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She's met so many new friends and has tons of stories to share. She'll remember the people and things she met on this journey.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But actually, there is no true ending to Wooly Warrior's story.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Remember the play Ying told us about when she showed us the treasure map?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ying said she'd already forgotten what most of the play was about.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All she could remember was that the hero had been searching for a legendary treasure to make their wishes come true.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I knew straight away that the treasure map wasn't for the Wooly Warrior's sword.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But it was a gift left to her by Ying's mother.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wanna guess how I found out?

Options.PlotLineKey: Because of the Wooly Warrior's story...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. That play was about the Wooly Warrior's story, and I remember each and every part of it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Because that play...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Was a gift from my Mom.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, time for a story from Encore.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
When you arrive at the Garden, you find that all the Irises have withered.

Ying realizes that these flowers were meant to be a special gift from her mother. Though she knows she will never see her mother again, she still expresses her gratitude for your help.

However, Encore senses the sorrow hidden beneath Ying's calm exterior and makes a promise with Ying that she will return to the Garden to witness the Wooly Adventure Squad's journey.

After Ying leaves, Encore reveals to you the true origin of the Wooly Adventure Squad storyâ€”it was a cherished gift from her own mother.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In this story, there are no exciting adventures

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No terrifying monsters.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It didn't happen once upon a time

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And it's not somewhere far, far away

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rather, it's in a little room

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Every night, there's a little girl

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She plays games with her mother

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Playing as the Wooly Warrior

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Together, she and her mom create story after story about courage and hope

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It also happens in a theater

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Every day, the little girl sits below the stage

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The curtain rises, and the music plays

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She watches her mother set everything up

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Bringing the Wooly Kingdom from the story into real life

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Little by little, the Wooly Kingdom becomes real

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And the Wooly Warrior sets off on her adventure

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She first climbs the tallest mountain

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Looking for the legendary sword that can split mountains and seas

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But it's really so the girl can prove how brave she is

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The toolbox was actually on the tallest shelf

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Wooly Warrior also searches every beach

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Looking high and low for the Shield of Faith that could brave any storm

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Her house had many nooks and crannies, after all

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The raspberry candy her mom hid could be anywhere

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Her mom recorded all the Wooly Warrior's adventures

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So the Wooly Kingdom grew bigger and bigger

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And the stories grew longer and longer

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They even performed the play in many cities

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But the little girl's mom got sicker

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: At the last show

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just before the Wooly Warrior got the Wreath of Hope

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The show ended

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But there was no "Encore."

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mom told me that once the applause starts at the final show of our tour, she'd take me onto the stage to make a wish.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But she collapsed before the play ended.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was so scared. I tried to come up with ways to make her feel better. I even kept a daily to-do list.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: At the time, I thought that if I stayed a good girl like the characters in the stories, Mom would get better and better...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But her illness got worse. She didn't get better, and the Gateway of Wishes never appeared.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore didn't know what to do anymore.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mom just asked me to sit by her bed and tell her stories.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So I told her about Warrior Cosmos, Fairy Cloudy, and many other things.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She always smiled each time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It was right around that time when Cosmos and Cloudy appeared from the stories.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mom told me they're a part of life, and these stories will always be with me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After she left, Encore had to become the Wooly Warrior, going on adventures on her own.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whether it was in the orphanage or with the Black Shores, Encore would write down everything she experienced.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With these stories, Mom will know what kind of adventures Encore had, and all the friends Encore made.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Later on, Encore wanted to continue writing the Wooly Warrior's story. But this time, it's a bit different from before.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now she has her own friends. Friends that she can adventure together to find the Gateway of Wishes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Because finding that gateway...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is the only way she can tell all her stories to her mom so she knows how well she did.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's why...

Options.PlotLineKey: That's why when you met Ying...
You wanted to go on an adventure with Ying.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah. She said she had a lot to say to her mother.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just like me. There's so much Encore wants to say and so many stories that Encore wants Mom to hear.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our time with Ying reminded me of all of that.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Even though Wooly Warrior's story has no true ending...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Will Ying's be any different? Will she be able to make her wish come true?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In the end, Ying said the adventure is over, and it's just a story...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She said she was happy and satisfied with that, but Encore saw that look on her face.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She looked really, really sad.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore knows how it feels. Just like how it used to be. No matter what Encore did, Mom wouldn't get any better.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My stories were the only things that could make her feel happy...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It was Mom who made me understand the power of stories.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's why after I went on this journey alone, Cosmos and Cloudly came out of the land of imagination.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And it's why Encore told Ying that our adventure should not end like this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This story deserves a better ending.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}...

Options.PlotLineKey: We should finish the story. Together.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Agreed! The story must have an ending!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But what should we do?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There's no way we can bring Ying's mother back. I mean, the Gateway of Wishes doesn't actually exist in real life...

Options.PlotLineKey: Then let's go find it in the story.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In the story?

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I remember Cloudy said that if you ever find yourself in a pickle in real life, you can always go back to the Wooly Kingdom to search for clues.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You also mentioned that's where the Gateway of Wishes is hidden, right? And you've always wanted to finish writing the story of the Wooly Warrior.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This means the final stage of the story should be set inside the Wooly Kingdom.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore sees what you mean!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore can invite you and Ying into the Wooly Kingdom, and go on a real adventure with meâ€”the Wooly Warrior!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But... the Kingdom isn't someplace you can go willy-nilly.

Options.PlotLineKey: We need Ying to believe the Wooly Kingdom really exists.
We need Ying to realize that we're her friends.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Only those who believe in the Kingdom can visit...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's for sure! We're a team together!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We should make a wreath for her and let her know that our adventure's not over yet!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore remembers it went something like this, the wreath is "A crown of flowers that can reflect a person's thoughts. Never withers, forever blossoming."

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How are we gonna make it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You mean... Verina!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's right! Verina loves flowers, she's a flower's best friend!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's see if she has any ideas.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
Encore explains that this story, passed down from her mother, has always been a source of strength for her. To Encore, stories are more than just an escapeâ€”they're a way to find the courage needed for new adventures. She hopes to share that same courage with Ying.

Determined to fulfill Ying's wish and give a perfect end to Encore's story, you and Encore decide to create a Wreath of Hope. To accomplish this, you seek the help of Verina.

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hi, {PlayerName}. Oh, Encore's here, too. How's it been?

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you here to see the new blossoms? You'll have to wait a while. They're still a bit shy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hi Verina, er, not exactly. we're here to ask you how we can make the Wreath of Hope.

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Wreath of Hope...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You give Verina a run-down of the story.

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see. You want to help finish the story Ying's mother left her and make her wish come true.

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But... I don't know how to make such a wreath either.

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: According to the story, this wreath is made of various kinds of flowers, it can reflect a person's thoughts, and it must blossom forever and never wither.

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The flowers that can reflect people's thoughts... The ones that I can think of are Waterlampsâ€”These flowers emit a faint glow at night, and passersby use them to guide their way.

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Or Wintry Bells. Wintry Bells bloom in cold and snowy weather. Seeing them in a cold winter will definitely make you happy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It can also be Dewvetchs. Due to their sweetness, they remind people of sugary candies.

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: However... these flowers all bloom in different seasons, so it'll be hard to put them together, let alone have them blossom forever and never wither.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, I remember you created a Blake Bloom for Rover that one time!

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's a bit different.

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Flowers made with Forte are just artificial creations. They can easily break up without actual substance.

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's not the same as life. Every life has its own journey, from blooming to withering, recording the feelings of every moment along the way.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Feelings...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh! I know!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since we can't really make a wreath of flowers exactly like the one in the story, we can make one using our feelings!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes! Exactly!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When me and Mom made wreaths, she'd always ask me to pick my favorite flowers.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If I was feeling happy, I would choose a bright red flower, since it made my heart feel warm. If I was feeling unhappy, I would take a blue one.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: At this point, it really doesn't matter what kind of flower it is. All that matters is everyone's feelings!

Options.PlotLineKey: Everyone's choice of flowers would be different.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We should make a wreath, and tell Ying our wishes to make our dreams come true!

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see what you mean. A wreath made with feelings...

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With that, you can express yourself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's right! Let's find flowers that can express our feelings!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When she sees the wreath, she'll definitely realize that the story of our team is still going!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This way, we can all visit the Wooly Kingdom together, and maybe our wishes can come true!

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do you mind if I help?

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Once you've collected enough flowers, bring them to me. I'll help you weave them into a wreath.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Great! Thank you, Verina! Off we go!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With Verina's guidance, you and Encore set out to find the perfect flowers that represent your feelings, weaving them together into a beautiful wreath.

Chapters.Title: Hand over the flowers to Verina

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Have you found the flowers you want?

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Look how pink it is. You must've been in a really good mood when you picked this one.

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The flower typically blooms in pairs, representing companionship and support. Perfect for conveying friendship.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And these. These are Encore's picks!

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's quite the selection, Encore. What do they all represent?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Have a look at this one. It's gold and shiny, and it matches the color of your eyes, Rover!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore picked flowers that resemble everyone. If we put them together, they can represent our whole team.

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's pretty special! I'm sure it'll look really nice once they're all together.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uh huh! Oh, one more thing, Verina. Can you leave a spot here on the wreath?

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Leave a spot...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's for Ying!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We don't know what kind of flower represents Ying's feelings, so we should leave a spot, and let her decide which feeling to put on there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Got it. I'll take it from here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you so much, Verina!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, when the wreath is done, we can go tell Ying the rest of the story.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't forget! Tomorrow afternoon.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After gathering the flowers, you craft the wreath, preparing to present it to Ying the next afternoon as a fulfillment of your promise.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, you're here!

Options.PlotLineKey: Told ya I won't be late.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're right on time. Encore has just set everything up.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course not, you're right on time. Encore has just set everything up.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: See this little stage? Cosmos and Cloudy helped me set it up. Pretty impressive, don'tcha think?

Options.PlotLineKey: Are you getting ready for an audition?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Cloudy says, "Right on. That's teamwork for ya!"

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Hmph. Give us some extra time, and we can make one bigger than that giant gate of Jinzhou. Baa!" Says Cosmos.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Audition? That actually sounds like a good idea. Then you can be part of Encore's cheerleading squad, {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I know this is just a small stage for storytelling. I wanted to try the way Mom used to do it. She and I started the Wooly Warrior story after all.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Besides, it'll be more fun this way!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore wonders if Ying will show up today. We didn't really pinky-promise...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore, {PlayerName}. Sorry for the wait...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Th-Thank you...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm so sorry...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All right. Now that Team Wooly's fully assembled, is everyone ready for the story?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ready. Umm... This stage...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is the small stage Encore made for the play, where the warrior's adventure continues.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Does anyone remember where we last left off?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I know...The Wooly Warrior was trying to find the three relics, but I'm not sure if she will find them or not.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's right. The Wooly Warrior sets out to find the three relics. This time she is not alone. She tries to climb to the top of the highest mountain with her trusty companions.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With the mountain being so high up, the waves raging below them, she nearly falls several times, but her friends manage to keep her steady.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In the end, she obtains the legendary Sword of Courage.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Later, she arrives at a beach, filled with sand as far as the eye can see. She searches and searches, and all she can find are just some tiny shells.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But with the help from her friends, the Shield of Faith is uncovered. Only the Wreath remains.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: W-will she find it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Unfortunately, no. After reaching the mythical Sea of Flowers, all the flowers have withered. No matter where she searches, the Wreath of Hope is nowhere to be found.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just like us...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yet, her companions want to finish this adventure for her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They gather flowers and weave their feelings into the shape of a crown.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The pink flowers are meant to make her feel happy, the blue flowers are hopes that she will not be scared of any obstacles...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This wreath brings together all the feelings and emotions of the companions during their adventure. Their gift to her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And that... is the moral of the story.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Her companions remark so. The wreath isn't fully completed. It's missing a very important flower.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ying, this wreath is missing the flower that represents your feelings and wishes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My feelings...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I know. It's missing an iris. I've always wanted Mom to see a garden full of blooming irises.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But those irises have already withered...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What if we could find one?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Find one...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What if we can find an iris and the Gateway of Wishes? Will you want to continue on this adventure, Ying?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I... Of course! But I thought there was no such thing as the Gateway of Wishes. It only exists in the story...

Options.PlotLineKey: If there isn't one in reality...
We can find it in the story.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In the story...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's right! Because stories aren't just stories. When you believe in them, they'll really exist.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just like how it is now. With everyone's feelings combined into the wreath, it slowly turns into a door. A door that leads to the deepest parts of the Wooly Kingdom.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Inside, the irises continue to bloom.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, do you believe in it and choose to continue this adventure?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I believe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Great. Off we go!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
At the appointed time, you return to the Garden and listen as Encore tells the story of the Wooly Warriorâ€”an adventure meant for the three of you.

As the story concludes, you present the Wreath of Hope to Ying, sharing your thoughts and feelings with her.

To complete the Wreath of Hope and keep the promise with her mother, you decide to embark on one final journey to the Wooly Kingdom, in search of Irises that bloom at last.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And just like that, the little warrior's wish's come true, putting a perfect ending to this adventure story.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The warrior finally gets to meet her mother, telling her all the stories and words she has always wanted to tell.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But the warrior's journey won't end here, as the path ahead is a long one.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore, {PlayerName}. Thank you both so much.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I-I finally got to see her, and we talked so much. I told her how much I've missed her, how I found the treasures she left behind, and how I met both of you...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I never thought I'd see her again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, I want you to have this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes! I know you still have more adventures ahead, so I'd like this wreath to keep you company.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I want to go back and tell my dad this story now, and tell him what my mother said to me. So, this is where we say goodbye.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Be sure to share our story with everyone!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I will! Goodbye!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Time for another feedback session from the audience. What do you think of this story?

Options.PlotLineKey: It's a story with a very happy ending.
The fights were still a bit too realistic for me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, Encore loves this ending!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But the parts where everyone was fighting as a team were super, super cool!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore loves this ending!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Wooly Warrior finally fulfilled her wish, and she got to tell her mother all her stories.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: About the companions she got to meet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Who she went on adventures with, defeating all kinds of monsters that stood in their way!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Their search for the sword and shield as a team, and how they put together the Wreath of Hope.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We've been to many places together, but there's so much more to go, and so many adventures and stories to write about.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These stories are an extension of life, they are...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah. Stories with happy endings! Mom said the same thing.

Options.PlotLineKey: It was a really good ending.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, Encore had never thought of such an ending when telling the Wooly Warrior story in the past.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I really enjoyed how it ended.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The story of the Wooly Warrior's search for the relics is finished, and my vacation is about to end. It's time to head back to Black Shores...

Options.PlotLineKey: That was a really short vacation.
Don't forget to finish your homework.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, we are kinda busy over there most of the year.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, enough with the homework already.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No biggie. Even though this story is over, Encore will make sure to prepare a new adventure next time we meet!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's be on the same team together, and you can still be the captain! Wanna do a pinky promise?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You reach out and lock your pinky with Encore's. Gazing into her eyes, you see the Wooly Warrior's earnest expression as she makes a heartfelt wish.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I pinky promise that we'll write as many stories as we can together...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As a team...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Pinky promised!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
The small warriors finally achieve their wishes, bringing a perfect end to this adventure.

As you bid farewell to the Wooly Kingdom, you know that tomorrow holds the promise of new adventures filled with hope.

You and Encore make a pinkie promise, vowing to craft the next story together. The adventure of the Wooly Warrior will never truly end.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Would you look at the sky... So this is the Wooly Kingdom.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName} and I can be your guide!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, I love the repetition. This is the Wooly Kingdom.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This story is gonna be longer than the last one. It looks like there'll be more puzzles to solve, and more monsters to fight.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And the door to make wishes should be in the deepest part.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What are your orders, Captain?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes! I wanna find the Gateway of Wishes and then see my mom again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Great! The adventure of Wooly Warrior can finally have an ending!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's get going!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
Arriving in the Wooly Kingdom, you and Encore embrace your roles as adventurous pioneers.
The gateway that can fulfill your deepest desires is hidden in the depths of the Wooly Kingdom.

Chapters.Title: Search for a way to the top

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Feeling stuck? Why don't we search around for clues?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We're almost there. After passing every trial set before 'em, the Flower of Hope is finally within the warriors' reach behind this door.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe this door leads to the Gateway of Wishes, where countless warriors once hoped to pass through to have their wishes come true.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And now, the warriors will find out what kind of monsters or treasures are hidden behind the door.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is everyone ready?

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: R-Ready... I'll be able to see my mom soon...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Right. Through the door, we go!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's okay, why don't we rest here for a while? Once we're all in top shape, we'll open the door together!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
After enduring countless trials, you finally stand before the Gateway of Wishes. Beyond the gateway, the Flower of Hope awaits.
If you're ready to see your wish come true, then open the gateway.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As a team...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Pinky promised!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
The small warriors finally achieve their wishes, bringing a perfect end to this adventure.

As you bid farewell to the Wooly Kingdom, you know that tomorrow holds the promise of new adventures filled with hope.

You and Encore make a pinkie promise, vowing to craft the next story together. The adventure of the Wooly Warrior will never truly end.
